actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.

official_title: A resolution to authorize the Committee on Banking and Currency to conduct an investigation and study of prices of lumber and plywood.

summary.text: Authorizes the House Committee on Banking and Currency to conduct an investigation and study of prices of lumber and plywood. Requires the Committee to report to the House on or before June 1973 the results of its investigation and study, together with such recommendations as it deems advisable.

titles.title: A resolution to authorize the Committee on Banking and Currency to conduct an investigation and study of prices of lumber and plywood.
